trans-unit.source: Report Category

seg-source.mrk: Report Category

target.mrk: 報表種類

trans-unit.source: Categorize reports based on business features and country/region

seg-source.mrk: Categorize reports based on business features and country/region

target.mrk: 根據業務特性和國家/地區將報表進行分類

<source>MODS_GS_CONF_XRAY_REP_CATEGORY_DET</source><metadata><othermeta content="C6682B5783636B2BE10000000A441470" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_FOLDER_ID"/><othermeta content="HELPX.MODS_GS_CONF_XRAY_SRF" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_TECH_NAME"/><othermeta content="SUDH" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_RESPONSIBLE"/><othermeta content="MODS_PRIMARY" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_FOLDER_GROUP"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_SHH_KEY"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_TRANSLATION_MEMORY"/><othermeta content="FI" name="LOIO.FOLDER.TERM_DOMAIN"/><othermeta content="DTA_CON" name="LOIO.IWB_TYPE"/><othermeta content="SUDH" name="LOIO.IWB_RESPONSIBLE"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.IWB_SHH_KEY"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_context"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_page_url"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_system"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_tour_alias"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_environment"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.KW_CONVREF.CLASS"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.KW_CONVREF.OBJID"/><othermeta content="S4HANA_PC" name="PHIO.IWB_INDUSTRY"/><othermeta content="1702" name="PHIO.RELEASE"/><othermeta content="20161125091646" name="PHIO.CREATED_AT"/><othermeta content="SUDH" name="PHIO.CREATED_BY"/><othermeta content="20161125091647" name="PHIO.LAST_CHANGED_AT"/><othermeta content="SUDH" name="PHIO.LAST_CHANGED_BY"/><othermeta content="" name="PHIO.IWB_LEVEL"/></metadata>
Definition

seg-source.mrk: Definition

target.mrk: 定義

trans-unit.source: Used to categorize statutory reports based on specific business features and the country/region of reporting

seg-source.mrk: Used to categorize statutory reports based on specific business features and the country/region of reporting

target.mrk: 此功能根據報表的特定業務特性和國家/地區分類法定報表

trans-unit.source: Use

seg-source.mrk: Use

target.mrk: 使用

trans-unit.source: To adhere to your statutory reporting requirements, you may need to submit tax reports to the government for a new functionality. You may also need to group versions of report based on functionality, country/region, organizational units, phases, or reporting activities. You can create such functional groups through <uicontrol>Report Categories</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: To adhere to your statutory reporting requirements, you may need to submit tax reports to the government for a new functionality.
You may also need to group versions of report based on functionality, country/region, organizational units, phases, or reporting activities.
You can create such functional groups through <uicontrol>Report Categories</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 若要遵守您的法定報表製作需求，您需要將稅務報表提交給政府以獲得新功能。
您也可能需要根據功能、國家/地區、組織單位、階段或報表製作作業將報表版本分組。
您可透過 <uicontrol>[報表種類]</uicontrol> 建立此種功能群組。

trans-unit.source: You can now create independent report categories using the <uicontrol>Define Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app. You must assign country/region, phases, organizational units, and activities to a report category. While assigning activities, you assign the phase to which it belongs. You can monitor and run the reporting activities in the<uicontrol> Run Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app. Creating a report category involves the following steps:

seg-source.mrk: You can now create independent report categories using the <uicontrol>Define Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app.
You must assign country/region, phases, organizational units, and activities to a report category.
While assigning activities, you assign the phase to which it belongs.
You can monitor and run the reporting activities in the<uicontrol> Run Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app.
Creating a report category involves the following steps:

target.mrk: 您現可使用 <uicontrol>[定義法規報表]</uicontrol> 應用程式建立獨立的報表種類。
您必須將國家/地區、階段、組織單位和作業指派給報表種類。
指派作業時，您會同時指派其所屬階段。
您可在 <uicontrol>[執行法規報表]</uicontrol> 應用程式中監控並執行報表製作作業。
建立報表種類涉及下列步驟：

trans-unit.source: Assign country/region

seg-source.mrk: Assign country/region

target.mrk: 指派國家/地區

trans-unit.source: You assign a country/region to the report category.

seg-source.mrk: You assign a country/region to the report category.

target.mrk: 將國家/地區指派給報表種類。

trans-unit.source: Add phases

seg-source.mrk: Add phases

target.mrk: 新增階段

trans-unit.source: You create phases for your report category. A phase is used to identify the type of report run that is generated in the app. A phase can be of type - <uicontrol>declaration</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>correction</uicontrol>, or <uicontrol>additional correction</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: You create phases for your report category.
A phase is used to identify the type of report run that is generated in the app.
A phase can be of type - <uicontrol>declaration</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>correction</uicontrol>, or <uicontrol>additional correction</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 建立您報表種類的階段，
該階段會用於識別應用程式中產生的報表執行類型。
階段可為下列幾種類型：<uicontrol>[申報]</uicontrol>、<uicontrol>[更正]</uicontrol> 或 <uicontrol>[附加更正]</uicontrol>。

trans-unit.source: When you generate a report run, by default, the report run type is <uicontrol>declaration</uicontrol>. Standard phase is the first submission to the government. Based on the country/region-specific requirements, you can generate a correction report, or additional correction report for the documents from the previous submissions or for the documents that may have been omitted from the previous submissions or runs.

seg-source.mrk: When you generate a report run, by default, the report run type is <uicontrol>declaration</uicontrol>.
Standard phase is the first submission to the government.

Based on the country/region-specific requirements, you can generate a correction report, or additional correction report for the documents from the previous submissions or for the documents that may have been omitted from the previous submissions or runs.

target.mrk: 當您產生報表執行時，依預設，報表執行類型為 <uicontrol>[申報]</uicontrol>。
標準階段是提交給政府的第一步。
根據國家/地區特定需求，您可針對先前提交的文件，或先前提交或執行時可能忽略的文件，產生更正報表或附加更正報表。

trans-unit.source: You set the valid from date, and assign the phase occurrence as <uicontrol>Single</uicontrol> or <uicontrol>Multiple</uicontrol> for all the phases.

seg-source.mrk: You set the valid from date, and assign the phase occurrence as <uicontrol>Single</uicontrol> or <uicontrol>Multiple</uicontrol> for all the phases.

target.mrk: 您可設定生效日期，並將所有階段的階段發生指派為 <uicontrol>[單一]</uicontrol> 或 <uicontrol>[多重]</uicontrol>。

trans-unit.source: When you set the phase occurrence as <uicontrol>Single</uicontrol>, all the activities of the phase can be submitted only once. After your activities are complete, you will not be able to process the activities again in the phase.

seg-source.mrk: When you set the phase occurrence as <uicontrol>Single</uicontrol>, all the activities of the phase can be submitted only once.
After your activities are complete, you will not be able to process the activities again in the phase.

target.mrk: 當您將階段發生設定為 <uicontrol>[單一]</uicontrol> 時，所有階段作業僅可提交一次。
作業完成後，您將無法再次於階段中處理作業。

trans-unit.source: When you choose the phase occurrence as <uicontrol>Multiple</uicontrol>, all the activities of the phase can be submitted any number of times after the report has been accepted, until the due date. You can repeat the phase multiple times.

seg-source.mrk: When you choose the phase occurrence as <uicontrol>Multiple</uicontrol>, all the activities of the phase can be submitted any number of times after the report has been accepted, until the due date.
You can repeat the phase multiple times.

target.mrk: 當您將階段發生選為 <uicontrol>[多重]</uicontrol> 時，在到期日之前，您可以在接受報表後，提交任意次數的階段作業。
您可以多次重複該階段。

trans-unit.source: You can set the submission possible until for correction and additional correction runs. It is set in years, months, or days. For example, if Submission Possible Until is set as 2 Months – It implies that you can start the correction runs after the standard submission and until 2 months after the current reporting period end date. You can also set negative values for months and days.

seg-source.mrk: You can set the submission possible until for correction and additional correction runs.
It is set in years, months, or days.

For example, if Submission Possible Until is set as 2 Months – It implies that you can start the correction runs after the standard submission and until 2 months after the current reporting period end date.
You can also set negative values for months and days.

target.mrk: 您可以設定更正和附加更正執行的可提交期限，
其會以年數、月數或天數設定。
例如，若將 [可提交期限] 設定為 2 個月，這意味您可以在標準提交後開始更改正執行，而期限為目前報表製作期間結束日期的 2 個月後。
您也可以將月數和天數設定為負值。

trans-unit.source: Assign Organizational Units

seg-source.mrk: Assign Organizational Units

target.mrk: 指派組織單位

trans-unit.source: You assign organizational units to a report category. You can submit tax reports at different reporting levels via the use of organizational units. The reporting levels currently supported for both <uicontrol>classic</uicontrol> and <uicontrol>enhanced</uicontrol> modes are - <uicontrol>company code</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>business place</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>jurisdiction code</uicontrol>, and <uicontrol>section code</uicontrol>. This feature allows you to use the <uicontrol>Run Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app to submit reports for countries/regions that require reporting at these additional levels. For example, Canada tax authorities require tax reporting at company code and tax jurisdiction levels. You can set values for the reporting levels while configuring the reporting entity. The assigned values get defaulted when you run the reports. You can assign the organizational units to the report categories in the <uicontrol>Define Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app.

seg-source.mrk: You assign organizational units to a report category.
You can submit tax reports at different reporting levels via the use of organizational units.

The reporting levels currently supported for both <uicontrol>classic</uicontrol> and <uicontrol>enhanced</uicontrol> modes are - <uicontrol>company code</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>business place</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>jurisdiction code</uicontrol>, and <uicontrol>section code</uicontrol>.
This feature allows you to use the <uicontrol>Run Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app to submit reports for countries/regions that require reporting at these additional levels.
For example, Canada tax authorities require tax reporting at company code and tax jurisdiction levels.
You can set values for the reporting levels while configuring the reporting entity.
The assigned values get defaulted when you run the reports.
You can assign the organizational units to the report categories in the <uicontrol>Define Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app.

target.mrk: 將組織單位指派給報表種類。
您可在不同報表製作層次中，透過使用組織單位提交稅務報表。

針對 <uicontrol>[典型]</uicontrol> 和 <uicontrol>[增強]</uicontrol> 兩種模式，目前支援的報表製作層次為 <uicontrol>[公司代碼]</uicontrol>、<uicontrol>[營業處]</uicontrol>、<uicontrol>[租稅轄區碼]</uicontrol> 和 <uicontrol>[區段代碼]</uicontrol>。
此功能可讓您使用 <uicontrol>[執行法規報表]</uicontrol> 應用程式，針對上述附加層次中需要報表製作的國家/地區提交報表。
舉例來說，加拿大稅捐機關在公司代碼和租稅管轄權層次中需要稅報表製作。
在組態報表製作實體時，您可以設定報表製作層次的值。
當您執行報表時，指派值將轉為預設值。
您可在 <uicontrol>[定義法規報表]</uicontrol> 應用程式中將組織單位指派給報表種類。

trans-unit.source: Assign Reporting Activities

seg-source.mrk: Assign Reporting Activities

target.mrk: 指派報表製作作業

trans-unit.source: Reporting activities are steps that needs to be performed to complete end-to-end compliance reporting process. In the <uicontrol>Define Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app, you create new reporting activities. You assign activities to your report category, based on your legal reporting requirements. While assigning activities, you assign the phase to which it belongs. You can monitor and run the reporting activities in the <uicontrol>Run Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app.

seg-source.mrk: Reporting activities are steps that needs to be performed to complete end-to-end compliance reporting process.
In the <uicontrol>Define Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app, you create new reporting activities.
You assign activities to your report category, based on your legal reporting requirements.
While assigning activities, you assign the phase to which it belongs.
You can monitor and run the reporting activities in the <uicontrol>Run Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app.

target.mrk: 若要完成點對點法規報表製作程序，則報表製作作業為必須執行的步驟。
在 <uicontrol>[定義法規報表]</uicontrol> 應用程式中，您可建立新的報表製作作業。
您可根據法定報表製作需求，將作業指派給您的報表種類。
指派作業時，您會同時指派其所屬階段。
您可在 <uicontrol>[執行法規報表]</uicontrol> 應用程式中監控並執行報表製作作業。

trans-unit.source: To understand the complete flow in <uicontrol>Run Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app and<uicontrol> Define Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app, please see the below sample scenario:

seg-source.mrk: To understand the complete flow in <uicontrol>Run Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app and<uicontrol> Define Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app, please see the below sample scenario:

target.mrk: 若要瞭解 <uicontrol>[執行法規報表]</uicontrol> 應用程式和 <uicontrol> [定義法規報表]</uicontrol> 應用程式的完整流程，請參閱下方的樣本方案：

trans-unit.source: To start with, in the <uicontrol>Define Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app, you should perform the following steps:

seg-source.mrk: To start with, in the <uicontrol>Define Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app, you should perform the following steps:

target.mrk: 首先，請在 <uicontrol>[定義法規報表]</uicontrol> 應用程式中執行下列步驟：

trans-unit.source: Create a report category REPCAT.

seg-source.mrk: Create a report category REPCAT.

target.mrk: 建立報表種類 REPCAT。

trans-unit.source: Assign a country/region to the report category.

seg-source.mrk: Assign a country/region to the report category.

target.mrk: 將國家/地區指派給報表種類。

trans-unit.source: Create a declaration and a correction phase for the report category.

seg-source.mrk: Create a declaration and a correction phase for the report category.

target.mrk: 建立報表種類的申報和更正階段。

trans-unit.source: Assign company code as the organizational unit to report category.

seg-source.mrk: Assign company code as the organizational unit to report category.

target.mrk: 將作為組織單位的公司代碼指派給報表種類。

trans-unit.source: Assign an activity A1 of type - SAP Fiori Application for the declaration phase. Add another activity A2 of type - Report Definition for the correction phase.

seg-source.mrk: Assign an activity A1 of type - SAP Fiori Application for the declaration phase.
Add another activity A2 of type - Report Definition for the correction phase.

target.mrk: 針對申報階段，指派類型為「SAP Fiori 應用程式」的作業 A1。
針對更正階段，新增類型為「報表定義」的其他作業 A2。

trans-unit.source: In the <uicontrol>Run Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app, when you select the report category and choose <uicontrol>Go</uicontrol>, you can see all the reporting tasks for the category. Select the reporting task that you want to execute. When you start the new phase, you can see the activity A1 in the declaration phase. After the declaration phase is complete, the system allows you to start the new phase. Choose Start new phase to start the correction phase. The system executes the activity A2 assigned to the correction phase.

seg-source.mrk: In the <uicontrol>Run Compliance Reports</uicontrol> app, when you select the report category and choose <uicontrol>Go</uicontrol>, you can see all the reporting tasks for the category.
Select the reporting task that you want to execute.
When you start the new phase, you can see the activity A1 in the declaration phase.
After the declaration phase is complete, the system allows you to start the new phase.
Choose Start new phase to start the correction phase.
The system executes the activity A2 assigned to the correction phase.

target.mrk: 當您在 <uicontrol>[執行法規報表]</uicontrol> 應用程式中選擇報表種類並選擇 <uicontrol>[開始]</uicontrol>，您便可查看該種類的所有報表製作工作細項，
選取您要執行的報表製作工作細項。
當您開始新階段時，就會在申報階段中看到作業 A1。
申報階段完成後，系統即可讓您開始新階段。
選擇 [開始新的階段] 以開始更正階段。
系統將執行指派給更正階段的作業 A2。
